snippet: Andrew Tahmooressi, held for seven months on weapons charges, arrived in his home state of Florida after a court in Mexico ordered his release.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Tahmooressi, held for seven months on weapons charges, arrived in his home state of Florida after a court in Mexico ordered his release.

headline.main: U.S. Marine Veteran Back Home After Months in Mexican Jail
headline.print_headline: Marine Veteran Back Home After Months in Mexican Jail
